titleStmt.title: Englands warning, that is three remarkable visions of Stephen Melish, an inhabitant of Breslaw, the chief city of Silesia Englished in the year 1664.
titleStmt.author: Melish, Stephen.

notesStmt.note: Caption title reads: Englands warning, that is, the 115th vision of Stephen Melish, June the 15th, 1664.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
